title: "Sony AI’s Pete Wurman to Deliver Keynote at IJCAI on Training the World’s Best Gran Turismo™ Racer: Gran Turismo Sophy™"
excerpt: "Wurman’s keynote, “Training the World’s Best Gran Turismo Racer”, will take place on Tuesday, July 26 at 2:00 p.m. CET. In his presentation, Wurman will share details on Sony AI’s breakthrough game AI research Gran Turismo SophyTM (GT Sophy) and how the company trained agents for Gran TurismoTM to compete with the world’s best e-sports drivers."
